actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to promote the development of American handicrafts.

summary.text: Directs the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts to establish and administer a program to promote the development of American Handicraft artists and their products. Instructs the Chairman, in cooperation with the Interagency Crafts Committee: (1) to formulate a plan for more effective coordination of federally assisted handicrafts programs; and (2) to establish and maintain in the District of Columbia a National Center for American Handicrafts. Authorizes the appropriation of such funds as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to promote the development of American handicrafts.
